text: w'in lahiqat bed zwjatkm mrtdat 'iilaa alkfar, walam yetkm alkufaar mhwrhn alty dfetmwha lhn, thuma zafirtm bhwla' alkufaar 'aw ghyrhm wantsrtm elyhm, faetu aladhin dhahabat 'azwajuhum min almuslimin min alghnaym 'aw ghyrha mithl ma aetwhn min almhwr qabl dhlk, wkhafu allah aladhi 'antum bih mwmnwn
